game.name: DCS: F-4E Northern Defenders Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: 1985 - Following a sudden shift in Soviet leadership, the USSR abandoned détente and launched a full-scale invasion of Western Europe. West Germany fell within days, and most of the German Air Force was wiped out on the ground. Only a handful of squadrons managed to escape to Britain, regrouping for
